remarks: Real number less-than is weakly linear.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This restates ~ ax-pre-ltwlin with ordering on the extended reals.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 15-Jan-2020.)
statement: axltwlin $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A < B -> ( A < C \/ C < B ) ) ) $.
